activityConfigurations.name: Confirm Transfer Order Item with Difference

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END

variables.name: AutomationActivities
variables.value: 'Create Purchase Requisition Item','Change Price','Create Purchase Order Item','Receive Order Confirmation','Vendor creates Invoice','Record Invoice Receipt','Record Goods Receipt','Print and Send Purchase Order (Paper)','Clear Invoice','Delete Purchase Order Item','Send Purchase Order Update','Change Vendor','Release Purchase Order','Change Currency','Adjustment Charge','Refuse Purchase Order','Cancel Invoice Receipt','Change Quantity','Cancel Goods Receipt','Block Purchase Order Item','Send Overdue Notice','Reactivate Purchase Order Item','Dun Order Confirmation'

variables.name: reworkActivities
variables.value: 'Adjustment Charge','Cancel Invoice Receipt','Cancel Goods Receipt','Block Purchase Order Item'

variables.name: ButtonDrilldown1
variables.value: CASE WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") >= 0 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 100 THEN 'a) 0 - 100€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 100 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 500 THEN 'b) 100 - 500€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 500 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 1000 THEN 'c) 500 - 1.000€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 1000 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 10000 THEN 'd) 1.000 - 10.000€' ELSE 'e) > 10.000€' END

variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN PROCESS EQUALS 'Create Purchase Order Item'
        THEN 'External Purchasing'
    WHEN PROCESS EQUALS 'Create Returns Order Item'
        THEN 'Return Order'
    WHEN PROCESS EQUALS 'Create Warehouse Order Item'
        THEN 'Warehouse Order'
    WHEN PROCESS EQUALS 'Create Production Order'
        THEN 'Production Order'
    WHEN PROCESS EQUALS 'Create Rearrangement Order Item'
        Then 'Rearrangement'
    ELSE 'From Own Warehouse'  
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN "LTAP"."PQUIT" = 'X'
        THEN 'Transfer Order Confirmed'
    ELSE 'Transfer Order in Progress'
END
